argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | ishil2.v | |- V = ( Base ` H ) |
| 2 |  | ishil2.s | |- .(+) = ( LSSum ` H ) |
| 3 |  | ishil2.o | |- ._|_ = ( ocv ` H ) |
| 4 |  | ishil2.c | |- C = ( CSubSp ` H ) |
| 5 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( proj ` H ) = ( proj ` H ) |
| 6 | 5, 4 | #P_ishil | |- ( H e. Hil <-> ( H e. PreHil /\ dom ( proj ` H ) = C ) ) |
| 7 | 5, 4 | #P_pjcss | |- ( H e. PreHil -> dom ( proj ` H ) C_ C ) |
| 8 |  | #P_eqss | |- ( dom ( proj ` H ) = C <-> ( dom ( proj ` H ) C_ C /\ C C_ dom ( proj ` H ) ) ) |
| 9 | 8 | #P_baib | |- ( dom ( proj ` H ) C_ C -> ( dom ( proj ` H ) = C <-> C C_ dom ( proj ` H ) ) ) |
| 10 | 7, 9 | #P_syl | |- ( H e. PreHil -> ( dom ( proj ` H ) = C <-> C C_ dom ( proj ` H ) ) ) |
| 11 |  | #P_dfss3 | |- ( C C_ dom ( proj ` H ) <-> A. s e. C s e. dom ( proj ` H ) ) |
| 12 | 10, 11 | #P_syl6bb | |- ( H e. PreHil -> ( dom ( proj ` H ) = C <-> A. s e. C s e. dom ( proj ` H ) ) ) |
| 13 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( LSubSp ` H ) = ( LSubSp ` H ) |
| 14 | 4, 13 | #P_csslss | |- ( ( H e. PreHil /\ s e. C ) -> s e. ( LSubSp ` H ) ) |
| 15 | 1, 13, 3, 2, 5 | #P_pjdm2 | |- ( H e. PreHil -> ( s e. dom ( proj ` H ) <-> ( s e. ( LSubSp ` H ) /\ ( s .(+) ( ._|_ ` s ) ) = V ) ) ) |
| 16 | 15 | #P_baibd | |- ( ( H e. PreHil /\ s e. ( LSubSp ` H ) ) -> ( s e. dom ( proj ` H ) <-> ( s .(+) ( ._|_ ` s ) ) = V ) ) |
| 17 | 14, 16 | #P_syldan | |- ( ( H e. PreHil /\ s e. C ) -> ( s e. dom ( proj ` H ) <-> ( s .(+) ( ._|_ ` s ) ) = V ) ) |
| 18 | 17 | #P_ralbidva | |- ( H e. PreHil -> ( A. s e. C s e. dom ( proj ` H ) <-> A. s e. C ( s .(+) ( ._|_ ` s ) ) = V ) ) |
| 19 | 12, 18 | #P_bitrd | |- ( H e. PreHil -> ( dom ( proj ` H ) = C <-> A. s e. C ( s .(+) ( ._|_ ` s ) ) = V ) ) |
| 20 | 19 | #P_pm5.32i | |- ( ( H e. PreHil /\ dom ( proj ` H ) = C ) <-> ( H e. PreHil /\ A. s e. C ( s .(+) ( ._|_ ` s ) ) = V ) ) |
| 21 | 6, 20 | #P_bitri | |- ( H e. Hil <-> ( H e. PreHil /\ A. s e. C ( s .(+) ( ._|_ ` s ) ) = V ) ) |
